item.title: LANKS - The Silence
item.description:
We come undone
To save ourselves
To save ourselves

Part of me is part of you
Part of us is hiding truth
And part of us is fighting through
The silence
Inside of me is something new
Change revolves becoming you
Inside of me, inside of you

We come undone
To save ourselves
To save ourselves
To save ourselves
Letting go
To save ourselves
To save ourselves

All of me needs all of you
When all the lines become the muse
All the tides becoming you

The silence
The silence
The silence
The silence

We come undone
To save ourselves
To save ourselves
To save ourselves
Letting
To save ourselves
To save ourselves

The silence
The silence
The silence
The silence
